author: Bollywood Hungama
title: Watch EXCLUSIVE: Amaal Mallik & Armaan Malik OPENS UP On Awards Fiasco Now - Bollywood Hungama
text: Home » Videos » Celeb Interview » EXCLUSIVE: Amaal Mallik & Armaan Malik OPENS UP On Awards Fiasco EXCLUSIVE: Amaal Mallik & Armaan Malik OPENS UP On Awards Fiasco Arvind Khadye Feb 15, 2017 - 1:40 pm IST 0 0 About the video In the second part of their Bollywood Hungama Exclusive Interview with Content Head Broadband, Faridoon Shahryar, Armaan Malik and Amaal Mallik talk about their recently released single song ‘Aaja Na Ferrari Mein’. The duo opens up on the awards fiasco and logically explains their stand against it. Must Watch!
